document.title: SP719-C Quick Bites Holiday Meals - Never Fear

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Most of us grew up watching our mothers and grandmothers working feverishly in the kitchen to prepare the “perfect” holiday meal. The meal was usually fabulous, but these hard-working family members often missed most of the day’s festivities, only to be thanked with a pile of dirty dishes. But holidays do not have to strike fear in the hearts of those of us caught in the kitchen. Through good planning, you can actually prepare a great meal and get to spend time with those you love – without flour coating your face.
